articles.content: Chrome has 3.2 billion users worldwide and now every single one of them needs to act because Google has confirmed multiple new hacks of its browser. Here is everything you need to know to stay safe. … [+3261 chars]

articles.author: GameCentral
articles.title: Battlefield 2042 bomb status goes nuclear as player count dips to 951 - Metro.co.uk
articles.description: The most recent Battlefield has seen its concurrent player count on Steam go from bad to worse, as it falls below 1,000 for the first time.
articles.content:
Battlefield 2042 player numbers seem to be in freefall (pic: EA)
